content: to 1 of negative ease in length as well repeat for the sole sts gusset repeat rounds 1 & 2 another 8 9 10 more times you on this section you are going to increase only on the should have a total of 56 64 72 sts per sock there sole sts on the instep sts you are going to continue will be 28 32 36 sts for the instep and 28 32 36 sts working in pattern for the sole round 1 continue working in pattern for the instep sts foot k all sole sts on this section the instep sts are worked in pattern round 2 continue working in pattern for the instep sts and the sole sts are worked in stockinette st knitting kfb k to 2 sts before end of sole sts kfb k1 chart on page 4 repeat rounds 1 & 2 another 13 15 17 times more round 1 *k3 p1* repeat to end of instep stitches k all you should have 28 32 36 sts for the instep and 56 sole sts 64 72 sts for the sole a total of 84 96 108 sts round 2 k all instep sts k all sole sts per sock round 3 work in pattern only on the instep sts one more time proceed to the heel section heel now you are going to work back and forth only on the sole sts for this section please pay attention to remember at which instep round you stopped before starting this section row 1 rs k42 48 54 turn row 2 ws mds p27 31 35 turn row 3 rs mds k to ds turn row 4 ws mds p to ds turn repeat row 3 & 4 another 7 8 9 more times row 5 rs mds k all sole sts - ds should be worked as a normal st work in pattern for the instep sts there should be 9 10 11 ds on each side and 10 12 14 normal sts in the center 3 flawless socks | 01 | copyright 2019 sambaknits | sambaknits@gmail com flawless socks heel flap cuff now you are going to work back and forth only on the work in rib 1x1 for 2 5 cm 1 bobble all sts using jeny s sole sts for this section again surprisingly stretchy bind off or any elastic bind off of your choice row 1 rs k41 47 53 ssk turn row 2 ws *sl1 wyif p1* repeat 13 15 17 times sl1 finishing wyif p2tog turn using your tapestry needle weave in all ends and row 3 rs sl1 wyib k26 30 34 ssk turn block row 4 ws *sl1 wyif p1* repeat 13 15 17 times sl1 wyif p2tog turn enjoy repeat row 3 & 4 another 11 13 15 times more row 5 rs sl1 wyib k26 30 34 ssk you should have 29 33 37 st for the sole at this point now you are going to
